features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Supabase-based authentication with session management, sign-in/sign-up interface, and protected routes

features.name: Natural Language Search
features.description: AI-powered search system that converts natural language queries into structured searches with real-time suggestions

features.name: Lead Table View
features.description: Virtualized table display with multi-select, scoring visualization, and bulk operations

features.name: Kanban Board View
features.description: Drag-and-drop lead pipeline management with status-based columns

features.name: Lead Detail Panel
features.description: Comprehensive lead information display with signals, notes, tags, and contact information

features.name: Lead Scoring System
features.description: Multi-factor scoring algorithm with configurable profiles for ICP matching, pain signals, and reachability

features.name: Website Analysis
features.description: Automated website scanning for technology detection, contact extraction, and signal identification

features.name: AI Lead Insights
features.description: AI-powered insights generation with personalized recommendations for lead engagement

features.name: Saved Searches
features.description: Search query persistence with custom naming, tagging, and re-run capabilities

features.name: Search History
features.description: Historical search tracking with analytics and performance metrics

features.name: Dashboard Home
features.description: Main dashboard interface with search history, quick actions, and performance metrics

features.name: Export System
features.description: Multi-format data export with CSV, JSON, and styled Excel capabilities

features.name: Advanced Filters
features.description: Real-time lead filtering with complex filter combinations and search refinement

features.name: Search State Management
features.description: Centralized search state management with caching and optimization

features.name: Job Status Tracking
features.description: Real-time search job progress tracking with status indicators

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Light/dark mode support with system preference detection

features.name: Lead Search Execution
features.description: Backend search processing with Google Places API integration and batch processing

features.name: Recent Searches
features.description: Quick access to recent search queries with re-run capability

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Reusable shadcn/ui components with Tailwind CSS styling

features.name: Database Integration
features.description: Supabase client configuration with auto-generated types and real-time subscriptions
